publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1062 John Swinney: Glasgow Commonwealth Games Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Glasgow Commonwealth Games Bill, agrees to any expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund for a new purpose in consequence of the Act.

S3M-1062 John Swinney: Glasgow Commonwealth Games Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Glasgow Commonwealth Games Bill, agrees to any expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund for a new purpose in consequence of the Act. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
